long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Group Manager is a powerful tool to help you organize and manage your browser tabs efficiently. Tired of cluttered tab bars? With Tab Group Manager, you can easily save, group, and organize your open tabs into customizable groups, making it a breeze to switch between different tasks and projects.

How to Use:

Click the "Refresh Tabs" button to see all your open tabs.

Use checkboxes to select the tabs you want to save in a group.

Enter a group name, and click "Save" to create a tab group.
